ovdesc.p: This live table i.e. updated from T24 with no user input, contains data related to the multi company set up.
There are several records in this table:-
CCY.FILE contains details of the local currencies used in the EMC database
CURRENCY - details of the companies that own the currency table and the companies that share them
CUSTOMER - details of the companies that own the customer tables and the companies that share them
FIN.FILE - the lead companies that own the financial level data and the companies that share this data e.g. ACCOUNT
FINANCIAL - the companies that own and share the financial descriptive data i.e. where the file classification is FTD, an example would be BASIC.INTEREST
MASTER - the master company, this will be the first company created in a T24 database
NOSTRO - the company that owns ad the companies that share the nostro accounts, file classification NOS, example NOSTRO.ACCOUNT
SUB.DIVISION - shows the link between a companies sub division code and the company key

desc.p: The company mnemonic of the company that shares the data owned by the company set up in the associated COMPANY.CODE
Sub valued within the multi valued COMPANY.CODE set
The company that shares the data owned by the company set up in the associated COMPANY.CODE

The company that owns the related data.

The key to the company check record.
